text: Tama maray Yallaa kee kay farmoytih amrit derre caba usun Yallih farmoyt√¢ luk yanin waqdi ku-amri oggolleh iyyan, tokkel Nabiyow ku-xaquk yawqen waqdi keenik horta Bar atu keenik itteemik akam malisak xiinan Yalli usun Bar malisak xiinaanam keenil yaktubeh, toysa Nabiyow atu ken maxaagitinaay derre keenit cab, usun tu-kok makalaanak Yallal kelit, Yalli usuk Awliinuu kee catoh koo xiqqihaak
